item.title: CA-210 West - Exit 74
item.description: CA-210 west at Exit 74 - I-215 North/Barstow. Continue west on CA-210 for Pasadena.

item.title: CA-210 West Approaching Exit 74
item.description: CA-210 west approaching Exit 74 - I-215 North/Barstow. CA-210 continues west towards Pasadena.

item.title: CA-210 West - Exit 75A and Exit 74
item.description: CA-210 west at Exit 75A - H St. Approaching Exit 74 - I-215 North/Barstow.

item.title: CA-210 West - Exit 75B
item.description: CA-210 West at Exit 75B - I-215 South/Riverside. Continue west on CA-210 for Pasadena, and I-215 North/Barstow Jct.

item.title: CA-210 West Approaching Exit 75B
item.description: CA-210 west approaching Exit 75B - I-215 South/Los Angeles/Riverside. CA-210 shield is on the right.

item.title: CA-60 East Approaching Exits 53AB
item.description: CA-60 east approaching Exit 53A - CA-91/Riverside, and Exit 53B - I-215 North/San Bernardino.

item.title: CA-60 East at Exit 52B and Exits 53AB
item.description: CA-60 east at Main St. Approaching CA-91/Riverside, and I-215 north to San Bernardino. CA-60 and I-215 are multiplexed east through Riverside.

item.title: CA-60 East Exit 52B
item.description: CA-60 east approaching Exit 52B - Main St. and Exits 53AB CA-91/I-215

item.title: CA-60 East Exit 53B
item.description: CA-60 East/I-215 South at Exit 53B - I-215/CA-60 split. I-215 south to San Diego; CA-60 east to Indio.

item.title: CA-60 East Exits 53AB
item.description: CA-60 east at Exit 53A - CA-91 South to Riverside and Beach Cities. New control city on CA-60 is Indio.

item.title: CA-60 East Exits 53AB
item.description: CA-60 east at Exit 53A - CA-91 South/Riverside/Beach Cities, and Exit 53B - I-215 North/San Bernardino.

item.title: CA-60 East Exits 53AB and 52B
item.description: CA-60 east approaching Exit 52B - Main St., Exit 53A - CA-91 South/Riverside, and Exit 53B - I-215 North/San Bernardino.

item.title: I-10 West Exit 72
item.description: I-10 west approaching Exit 72 - I-215/Riverside/San Bernardino, 1/2 mile.

item.title: I-10 West Exit 72
item.description: I-10 west to Los Angeles at Exit 72 - I-215/Riverside/San Bernardino/Barstow.

item.title: I-10 West Exit 72
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 72 - I-215/Riverside/San Bernardino/Barstow.
